website_summaries.verdict: Great for outdoor adventures and casual activities around the town - the right-from-the-box comfort many people have loved about the Moab Prime now comes in an all-leather upper. Even more admirable is the fact that it’s waterproof.The Moab Prime 2 WP has surpassed the expectations of many when it comes to performance, protection, and durability, though it is best suited for well-maintained trails and less challenging terrain.
pros: The majority of Merrell Moab 2 Prime Waterproof reviews speak of how comfortable this shoe is right out of the box
Most buyers admire this hiking shoe for its sturdy construction
Several people who tested it in torrential rain are happy that this hiker has kept their feet warm and dry
Most reviewers find the Merrell Moab 2 Prime Waterproof hiking shoes cool-looking with its all-leather upper
Many are impressed by the quality of materials used in this shoe, including the Vibram outsole
A handful of wearers say that it fits great
cons: A few customers find it a little too warm at some days

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I'm a big fan of Merrell shoes. I have four pairs including another pair of Moab. They're always comfortable right out of the box and the build quality is generally good. I bought this pair of Moab's to replace another pair of all leather shoes Merrell discontinued years ago. I had them for 15 years and wore a hole through the bottom of both soles. So given my past experience with Merrell I'm confident these will meet or exceed my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Tia Q White

customer_reviews.title: Similar to any other Chinese shoe
customer_reviews.text: I've had Merrell in the past and plan to keep the shoe. But let's be honest. These are no different than any other Chinese glued together, poorly stitched crap. Unless you want to spend a few hundred for American made Danner, everything else is about the same. Even the cheaper Danner are now Chinese. I seriously doubt that anyone can tell the difference between a $30 (no name) and $130 (brand name) pair of Chinese made hikers. Next time, I'll just buy the cheaper junk.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Not the same shoe company they used to be
customer_reviews.text: No wonder my Merrell's seem to fall apart faster than usual. Glue and overall craftsmanship has gone downhill. Depending on the how long they last this might be my last pair of Merrell's. My last pair didnt even make it year before they came apart in the exact same spot. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Ddog

customer_reviews.title: Not so strong..
customer_reviews.text: Immensely disappointed, I’ve had these shoes for only 1 week and the loops where the laces go through are already ripping... so disappointed.. I would like to return these for another pair, can’t believe it’s only one week and I’m having issues..
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Pedersen

customer_reviews.title: They are wide enough for a womens foot
customer_reviews.text: Very nice shoe! I have wide feet for I need to buy a mans shoe, Fit right the moment I put them on!
customer_reviews.author: Christie

customer_reviews.title: Great hiking shoes
customer_reviews.text: I am a loyal customer for Merrell hiking shoes. Once you wear these shoes you'll never buy another brand. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and great support.
customer_reviews.text: I love Merrell Moab shoes. They are very comfortable and well constructed. I have 3 other pairs and would recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Myron D. Hungerford

customer_reviews.title: Ordered a 1/2 size bigger and was glad I did
customer_reviews.text: I have really only tried them on.. Haven't given them any miles.. I always liked the way Merrel made their shoes so I went for it.. I Ordered a 1/2 size bigger and was glad I did..
customer_reviews.author: A. Wrobel

customer_reviews.title: Fits like other Merrel shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love the design of this shoe, although it does not have as much cushion as sneakers - it is very comfortable. I love that it is waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: You'd think for 140 bucks, these things would stay together longer than four months! I expect some wear but not the sole coming off. Disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Trees4est

customer_reviews.title: Merrill shoes are great!
customer_reviews.text: Had a pair of canvas ones before. I like the leather. They fit well and are very comfortable. My other ones lasted several years. Saved $30 from in store price.
customer_reviews.author: K. Wiseman

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Fit great, look great, feel great! Worth every dollar! Nice shoes...
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Run small
customer_reviews.text: These run small by at least a half size. I had to return them and was not refunded the shipping fee I paid. Return shipping was free through Amazon though.
customer_reviews.author: Cbell

customer_reviews.title: Wear merrell
customer_reviews.text: I like the shape and the feel I feel nothing but comfort When I wear them Hi marks definitely nicer than I expected definitely recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Size runs small am usually a 10 1/2 but need 11 1/2
customer_reviews.author: 1nicholas maddaloni

customer_reviews.title: Always a great Quality product.
customer_reviews.text: Great Quality. I expect to get several years of use out of them .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really comfortable hiking show!
customer_reviews.text: Great hiking shoe that works very well for everyday use!
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel J. Belknap

customer_reviews.title: So far so goid
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Comfortable right after the box. Last pair Merrel continumm lasted 11yrs. I have read that these Moab’s separate from the sole prematurely. So far so goid
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Merrell is great as always, and good waterproofing
customer_reviews.text: I've always been a fan of Merrells, especially the Moabs - I've got a bunch of them. But this was my first time with the all-leather, waterproof Prime model. One of the things I like about Merrells is that they fit comfortably right out of the box. The same was true of the Primes, though they were a little bit more stiff (not surprising since they're all leather). The day after they arrived, I got to test them out in the torrential rain (my dog better realize how much I love her), and my feet were nice and dry by the time I got home. And my feet weren't as hot and sweaty as they were with other waterproof shoes.
customer_reviews.author: L. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: runs about a half size too smal
customer_reviews.text: love them but they run about a half size too small and the tread seems to pick up small rocks, pea size or smaller
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Boyce

product_meta.title: Merrell mens J99731 Moab 2 Prime Waterproof
product_meta.description:
* Find adventure on every trail with the tough weather protection, comfortable support, and superior grip of the Merrell® Moab 2 Prime Waterproof hiking shoes. 
 * M Select™ DRY technology seals out water while allowing moisture to escape.
 * Waterproof full grain leather upper with suede tongue and collar.
   
 * Bellows tongue helps keep debris out. 
 * Lace-up closure. 
 * Protective rubber toe cap. 
 * Heel pull loop.
 * Padded tongue and collar. 
 * Breathable mesh lining offers a great in-shoe feel.
 * Kinetic Fit™ BASE removable contoured footbed features zonal arch and heel support. 
 * Compression-molded EVA midsole provides stable comfort. 
 * Molded nylon arch shank adds support. 
 * Merrell air cushioning in the heel absorbs impacting shock and helps stabilize the foot. 
 * Vibram® TC5+ outsole delivers high-performance durability, stability, and traction. 
 * 5 mm lug depth.
 * Imported. 
 * Measurements:  *  Weight: 1 lb 3.8 oz
   
   
 * Product measurements were taken using size 12, width M. Please note that measurements may vary by size.
feature_bullets: Waterproof membrane seals out water and lets moisture escape
